name: Swarm of Esteron
condition_immunities: charmed, frightened, grappled, paralyzed, petrified, prone, restrained, stunned

actions.name: Bites
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 0 ft., one creature in the swarm’s space. Hit: 14 (4d6) piercing damage, or 7 (2d6) piercing damage if the swarm has half its hp or fewer.

special_abilities.name: Amphibious
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can breathe air and water.

special_abilities.name: Keen Smell
special_abilities.desc: The swarm has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on smell.

special_abilities.name: Swarm
special_abilities.desc: The swarm can occupy another creature’s space and vice versa, and the swarm can move through any opening large enough for a Tiny esteron. The swarm can’t regain hit points or gain temporary hit points.
